quiz_one.question: Javascript: Which of the following function of String object returns a string representing the specified object?
quiz_one.feedback: Correct answer is toString(). It returns a string representing the specified object.

quiz_one.question: Javascript: Which of the following is the correct syntax to print a page using JavaScript?
quiz_one.feedback: Correct answer is window.print(); indexOf() method returns the index within the calling String object of the first occurrence of the specified value, or -1 if not found.

quiz_one.question: Javascript: Which of the following function of Array object creates a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element in this array?
quiz_one.feedback: Correct answer is map() âˆ’ Creates a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element in this array.
